#summary Gasstations (v2.0 rev1.0)

[OpenAPIv20r10FunctionIndex Function Index]

<h1>Get all gas stations (v2.0 rev1.0)</h1><p>Provides a list of car2go gas stations in context of specific location like ulm or austin in KML format.
              <p>
              KML is a file format used to display geographic data in an Earth browser such as Google Earth, Google Maps, and Google Maps  for mobile. More information about KML can be found here: <a href="http://code.google.com/intl/de/apis/kml/documentation/kmlreference.html" target="_blank">KML Reference at  code.google.com</a>
              </p>
              <p>
              The gas stations can be used to refuel a car2go. The customer can use the car2go fuel card to pay at those gas stations.
              </p></p><table class="funcdetail"><tr><td class="funcdetailheader">Access:</td><td>public</td></tr><tr><td class="funcdetailheader">URL:</td><td>http://www.car2go.com/api/v2.0/gasstations</td></tr><tr><td class="funcdetailheader">Method:</td><td>GET</td></tr></table><h3>Parameters</h3><table class="parameters"><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Mandatory</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>loc</td><td>true</td><td> location identifier string of the home location for which the vehicles are searched for, e.g. "ulm", "austin".</td></tr><tr><td>format</td><td>false</td><td> defines response format. Value "json" => JSON format, otherwise xml format is used</td></tr></tbody></table><h3>Request Examples</h3><div class="sample"><pre>GET http://www.car2go.com/api/v2.0/gasstations?loc=ulm</pre></div><div class="sample"><pre>GET http://www.car2go.com/api/v2.0/gasstations?loc=austin</pre></div><h3>Response</h3>The KML file defines a placemark tag for each car2go gas station. The placemark tag defines following sub tags:
                  <ul>
                  <li>name - The name of the gas station</li>
                  <li>description - empty</li>
                  <li>point- the coordinates of the gas station</li>
                  <li>extendeddata - empty</li>
                  </ul><h3>Response Examples</h3><div class="sample"><pre>
